mapper.sql: id as pid, create_time, deleted, modify_time, pay_money, task_id, hr_company_id, hr_company_name, hotel_id, hotel_name, worker_id, worker_name, pay_type
mapper.select: select b.*,c.name as hrCompanyName,c.logo as hrCompanyLogo,c2.name as hotelName,c2.logo as hotelLogo FROM bill b inner join company c on b.hr_company_id = c.id left join company c2 on b.hotel_id = c2.id WHERE b.task_id = #{hotelTaskID} and b.task_hr_id = #{hrTaskId} order by b.create_time desc

select b.*,c.name as hrCompanyName,c.logo as hrCompanyLogo,u.nickname as workerName,u.avatar as workerAvatar FROM bill b inner join company c on b.hr_company_id = c.id left join user u on b.worker_id = u.worker_id WHERE b.task_hr_id = #{hrCompanyTaskId} and b.worker_id = #{workerId} order by create_time desc
select count(1) FROM bill b inner join company c on b.hr_company_id = c.id WHERE b.task_hr_id = #{hrCompanyTaskId} and b.worker_id = #{workerId}

select c.name as payer,u.nickname as cashier, date_format(b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as time, IFNULL(b.pay_money, 0) as salay, case b.status when 0 then '未确认' when 1 then '同意' when 2 then '拒绝' end as status FROM bill b inner join company c on b.hr_company_id = c.id left join user u on b.worker_id = u.worker_id WHERE b.task_hr_id = #{hrCompanyTaskId} and b.worker_id = #{workerId} order by b.create_time desc
select count(1) FROM bill b inner join company c on b.hr_company_id = c.id WHERE b.task_id = #{hotelTaskID} and b.task_hr_id = #{hrTaskId}

select c.name as cashier,c2.name as payer,date_format(b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as time, IFNULL(b.pay_money, 0) as salay, case b.status when 0 then '未确认' when 1 then '同意' when 2 then '拒绝' end as status FROM bill b inner join company c on b.hr_company_id = c.id left join company c2 on b.hotel_id = c2.id WHERE b.task_id = #{hotelTaskID} and b.task_hr_id = #{hrTaskId} order by b.create_time desc

FROM bill b inner join user u on b.worker_id = u.worker_id left join company c on b.hotel_id = c.id WHERE b.task_id = #{hotelTaskID} and b.worker_id = #{workerId} and pay_type = 3 order by b.create_time desc
select count(1) FROM bill b inner join user u on b.worker_id = u.worker_id left join company c on b.hotel_id = c.id WHERE b.task_id = #{hotelTaskID} and b.worker_id = #{workerId} and pay_type = 3
